messages.content: Everyone I speak to feels let down by those in power. Gordon Brown has made a real mess of things. Tax hikes on ordinary people, the worst recession in decades, the MPs expenses scandal.
But here in our area only the Liberal Democrats can offer the real change we need. Labour has failed - and the Conservatives won't offer the real change that Britain needs right now.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Lib Dem or Conservative... Voting Labour will just help the Conservatives here.

issues.economy: Tax hikes on ordinary people, the worst recession in decades.
issues.health: I've campaigned against NHS cuts and fought to save local bus services.

leaflet.personalStatement: You know that my fight will always be for our area and the people who live here.

politicalExperience.achievements: I've campaigned against NHS cuts and fought to save local bus services. I have a track record in this area, someone who will speak out for us and run our family's businesses. This area is part of my family, and I care passionately about it.

contactInformation.address: 5 Pike Law Road, Scapegoat Hill, Huddersfield, HD7 4NL
